title: COVID-19 Vaccine: Engagement Strategies and Referral Guidance for Medical Staff and their Patients Video | Children's National Hospital
description: Watch the discussion on COVID-19 vaccines and ways to address vaccine hesitancy in the community, and information about a Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine clinical trial for children ages 6 months to 12 years.
cleaned_text: Video Series: COVID-19, Webinars Health Topics: Infectious Diseases Invest in future cures for some of life's most devastating diseases Share your birthday with a child. Celebrate your life, and give a chance to someone who desperately wants to have as many as you.
